    • About Valerie Hunter Kelly


    As a military spouse who has moved numerous times, I understand the stress of relocation.Doing Real Estate in various markets has allowed me exposure to various Real Estate Markets. I specialize in military and corporate transfers , first time buyers and am licensed in Kentucky and Tennessee. Please call me or email me to benefit from my years of expertise!
